text: He jinna ani manavancya samuhanno! Kaya tumacyajavala tumacyamadhuna rasula (paigambara) nahi aleta? Je tumacyasamora amacya ayati vacuna aikavita hote ani tumhala ya (kayamatacya) divasaca samana karanyababata saceta karita rahile. Te mhanatila, amhi svatahvirud'dha saksi ahota ani aihika jivanane tyanna dhokyata thevale ani te svatahvirud'dhaca saksa detila ki te kaphira (inkari) hote
